Event.Title: Community Clean-Up Day
Event.Description: Join us for a neighborhood clean-up event. Bring gloves and bags!

Event.Title: Summer Music Festival
Event.Description: Three-day outdoor music festival featuring local artists and food vendors.

Event.Title: Youth Soccer Tournament
Event.Description: Annual youth soccer tournament for ages 8-16. Registration required.

Event.Title: Farmers Market Opening
Event.Description: Weekly farmers market starts this weekend! Fresh produce and local crafts.

Event.Title: Public Safety Workshop
Event.Description: Learn about emergency preparedness and community safety resources.

Event.Title: Art Gallery Exhibition
Event.Description: Showcasing local artists' works. Opening night reception included.

Event.Title: Marathon Training Program
Event.Description: Free 12-week marathon training program for beginners and experienced runners.

Event.Title: Town Hall Meeting
Event.Description: Monthly town hall meeting to discuss municipal projects and concerns.

Event.Title: Children's Book Fair
Event.Description: Family-friendly book fair with author readings and activities for kids.

Event.Title: Street Food Festival
Event.Description: Taste dishes from around the world at our annual street food festival.
